TopicTitle: Discussion thread - BD Armory AI tournaments

Articles.Content:
First bracket (determined randomly):

Rafale Shark vs. F-8 Goblin

Hornet III-B vs. X-Viper Elite

Mosquito Mk II-A vs. Hellion 3D

MIG-35 (Edit: Some missiles and ammo removed to comply with 60 point limit) vs. CK-141A

Edited July 29, 2015 by QuesoExplosivo

Perhaps it's just me but it seems a bit soon to run again with the exact same crafts. I started upgrading mine but it's only 2 days since the last one, one each weekend or when there's enough new/updated seems more reasonable.

Maybe, but mine's in this one

Anyway, I think the different starting configuration is having interesting effects. Planes with shorter take-off distances have an advantage, in my testing.

Maybe, but mine's in this one

Anyway, I think the different starting configuration is having interesting effects. Planes with shorter take-off distances have an advantage, in my testing.

Ah, I didn't realise you missed the last one, can you wait 30 mins, I can have the Daz1 mK2 ready.
OK, sure. I was planning on doing most of the rounds tomorrow anyway.

I'm not certain it's better but I'll give it a go, I upgraded all the wings and armour plated the engines, has 55 points (2 vulcan, 3 ammo, 5 flare). It's just an empty fuselage that the fuel cans are clipped into.

http://www./download/tii3a48s7wytq8g/Daz1+Mk2+Type+B.craft

Yop !

I work on my WWII plane but i'm fine if you re-use my last Rafale Shark . I got minor tweak for him but i probably don't have the time .

And a good luck to everyone

comply with 60 point limit

I just started making a plane; points?

I just started making a plane; points?

The last PTS system :

-Missiles - 4 points (all types)

-CM pods - 5 points

-Ammo Can - 4 points (all types)

-.50 cal turret - 4 points

-GAU 8 30mm - 11 points

-M230 - 6 points

-Vulcan Hidden - 9 points

-Vulcan Turret - 8 points

And all mobile turret must be fixed (0 angle)

...and point cap at 60

Also, can I have the craft file for your plane? I want to test mine against it.

Click on my Sig Pic the yellow plane .

I'm modelling my plane after the Eurofighter, and the Rafale, and I really like your wing set up, but I don't want to use it, because our planes already look really similar...

Edit; Changed it up a bit. My plane is quite nice I'll say...

Also, AIM-120 or AIM-9?

Edited July 29, 2015 by RocketTurtle

Also, AIM-120 or AIM-9?

Just my PoV but if you already have a heavy mass craft go with Sidewinder , else go with ARRAM sightly bit better .

Just my PoV but if you already have a heavy mass craft go with Sidewinder , else go with ARRAM sightly bit better .

My plane is pretty light, but... hm.

OK, the tournament is starting!

Crafts (seed randomly determined):

1: Hellion 3-D

2: CK-141A

3: Mosquito Mk. II-A

6: DAZ-1 Mk. 2

9: F-8 Goblin

10: X-Viper Elite

11: K-4G Advanced

6 vs. 11

7 vs. 10

8 vs. 9

The plane that wins 3 out of 5 battles advances to the round of 8.
